Name: Dazed
Rules: You cannot spend Clues to convert dice results or perform additional puzzle steps. At the end of your turn, discard this card

Name: Focused
Rules: You may discard this card to convert all Clues to Successes while resolving a test.

Name: Restrained
Description: Arrrgggh I cannot move. or can I ?
Rules: You cannot move voluntarily. At the end of your turn discard this card.

Name: Stunned
Rules: You cannot perfom more than a single action during your turn. At the end of your turn discard this card.

Name: Wounded
Rules: You cannot perform the move action more than once each round. When you have suffered Damage equal to your health you are eliminated.
